description: Matchup knowledge combining community theory + player-specific data from patterns.json. Player data auto-updated after each match.

Franks_vs_Mongols.reason: Mangudai hard-counters cavalry. Camels counter Knights. Mongol mobility prevents Frank engagement.
Franks_vs_Mongols.suggested_strategy: Avoid mass Knights. Go Archer + Siege Workshop (Scorpions counter Mangudai). Early aggression before Mangudai mass.

Franks_vs_Romans.reason: Fast construction enables tower rush. Infantry speed makes it hard for Knights to flee. Centurion + Halberdier is cost-effective.
Franks_vs_Romans.suggested_strategy: Scout early to detect tower rush. Quick walls. Don't let them establish forward. Knight raids on eco.

Franks_vs_Indians.reason: Imperial Camel hard-counters Paladin. Cheap villagers mean eco advantage. Elephant Archers tanky.
Franks_vs_Indians.suggested_strategy: Early Knight aggression before Camels mass. Throwing Axemen counter Camels. Don't go late game.

Franks_vs_Burgundians.reason: Both are cavalry civs. Burgundians get Cavalier in Castle Age (power spike). Franks have HP bonus.
Franks_vs_Burgundians.suggested_strategy: Don't engage Cavalier 1v1 in Castle Age (they upgrade earlier). Boom behind walls, fight in Imperial with Paladin HP advantage.

Franks_vs_Britons.reason: Knights can close distance on archers. Cheap castles for forward pressure. Throwing Axemen outrange most foot archers.
Franks_vs_Britons.suggested_strategy: Knight rush to deny archer mass. Forward castle to threaten base. Don't let game go to massed Longbowmen.

Franks_vs_Italians.reason: Genoese Crossbowmen hard-counter cavalry. Condottiero counters gunpowder. Italians get cheaper age-ups.
Franks_vs_Italians.suggested_strategy: Early aggression before Genoese mass. Throwing Axemen + Siege against Genoese. Don't mass Paladins into Genoese.

Franks_vs_Byzantines.reason: Franks have stronger military overall. Byzantines are defensive/flexible but lack power units. Cataphracts are expensive.
Franks_vs_Byzantines.suggested_strategy: Standard Knight rush. Pressure early, don't let them boom to Cataphract mass.

Franks_vs_Japanese.reason: Japanese infantry bonus strong vs cavalry. Samurai are anti-unique-unit. But Franks have eco advantage (free farm upgrades).
Franks_vs_Japanese.suggested_strategy: Avoid melee with Samurai. Use cavalry mobility to raid. Scorpions against infantry mass.

Franks_vs_Cumans.reason: Cumans have second TC in Feudal (eco boom), Steppe Lancers, fast mobility. Franks have stronger Castle Age.
Franks_vs_Cumans.suggested_strategy: Pressure in Feudal to deny second TC advantage. Knight timing attack in early Castle.
